website_summaries.verdict: With its compact design, this 12-piece kit fits in a diaper bag. Has almost everything needed to groom and care for baby.
pros: Transparent zippered pouches makes it easy to see each supply
Conveniently rolls up to save space and has hook on top to hang
Components of the kit requiring FDA approval are registered and meet necessary product requirements
cons: Thermometer takes approximately 20 seconds to get an accurate read

customer_reviews.title: Nail clippers are great. The syringes are cheap and pretty much worthless
customer_reviews.text: A lot of extra junk. Nail clippers are great. The syringes are cheap and pretty much worthless. The brush would be nice if my baby had hair, haha! All in all, I'd say just order the couple of items you may need rather than a package of extra crap you won't ever use. I purchased for nail clippers and bulb syringes, but the bulb syringes are worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Must have items!!!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this great on-the-go healthkit. This has so much more accessories than the typical baby kit. I love the pouch and the packaging allowed you to view every item. Hoping this last into the toddler years for many of the items. Whether it is your first baby or your last, definitely a must have for any responsible care taker.
customer_reviews.author: inrevisionfromyesterday

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest quality
customer_reviews.text: Some of the items in this kit are poor quality. I found the hair brushes and thermometer to be a decent quality, but nothing else. The remaining items are cheaply made and have not been useful.
customer_reviews.author: Megan M.

customer_reviews.title: Useful items
customer_reviews.text: Love every thing in this pack except the nasal aspirators. They have absolutely no suction. Also one finger nail clipper out of the two (the green pair) had no sharpness so they didn't cut anything. Overall the pack has so many useful items. Would recommend as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: The kit is very nice, however the digital thermometer would never beep to ...
customer_reviews.text: The kit is very nice, however the digital thermometer would never beep to let you know that the temp had been read properly, so I had to go buy a separate thermometer for this kit!!
customer_reviews.author: amy hall

customer_reviews.title: My baby gets so upset cause I have to suck his nose so many more times than when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything is miniature size. The snot sucker is so small that it doesn’t get enough suction to pull boogers out. My baby gets so upset cause I have to suck his nose so many more times than when I use a bigger sucker.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: It is ok but not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: It is as expected to this price range. I wish there was a more quality product option to these items
customer_reviews.author: ZOeH

customer_reviews.title: Great for any mom
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a baby gift for a first time mom, and she's loving it!
customer_reviews.author: light wallet

customer_reviews.title: A-okay!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great basic kit to have on hand. However, we are already replacing some of the items with higher quality ones.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M.

customer_reviews.title: The bag that this came with does not have great pockets to fit everything
customer_reviews.text: The bag that this came with does not have great pockets to fit everything. I wish it already came assembled in the bag. Not great quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for quality!
customer_reviews.text: All the essentials for your new babies hygine needs. Even some awesome first aid supplies. Great quality products. I love that it came with two Mail clippers!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea :)

customer_reviews.title: I am surprise to see thr quailty is excellent and just right on size to use and double ...
customer_reviews.text: I am surprise to see thr quailty is excellent and just right on size to use and double items for diaper bag and playpen.
customer_reviews.author: HMoM

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I didn't give this kit 1 star, because it actually has a lot of useful things in it. However, as soon as I opened the kit, the zipper broke off the pouch, rendering it useless.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Great baby shower gift for the moms to be in your life. Our friend is expecting and she absolutely loved this. Hardly anyone thinks when purchasing gifts to buy the essentials like this. It is almost always diapers and cute clothes. This kit has absolutely everything.
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: The nail trimmer is so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Has everything you need for a first time parent. The nail trimmer is so easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Val B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Kit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift, they loved it! Great quality items and easy for storage / travel :)
customer_reviews.author: Syka

customer_reviews.title: I feel perfect for first time
customer_reviews.text: All in one. I feel perfect for first time MOM

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: if you have a new born for sure you'll need this.

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This has everything you need for baby. I am pleased with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Love the kit
customer_reviews.text: Love the kit, comes with two bags and doubles of many things so you can keep one in the diaper bag and one in the bathroom. It was most definitely worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Everything in one spot
customer_reviews.text: Everything I needed in one spot and even items I didn’t realize I would need.
customer_reviews.author: Latricia Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is great, love the second set for the diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice selection, used as shower gift and was well received by expectant mother
customer_reviews.author: nmart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with the quality of the items, I feel like everything will be put to good use
customer_reviews.author: Winston Risser

customer_reviews.title: This is a great baby kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great baby kit. It includes everything needed to care for baby. That being said, it includes two of most things in the set. You would do just as well to buy most of these supplies separately. The case that they come with is very cheaply made and was not made to fit all of the items included.The individual products included are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has everything a baby needs for grooming and keeping healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I'm satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly as I was expecting. I'm not using the items yet, cause I'm still pregnant, but I'm satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... has everything I could need for my baby so glad I got this
customer_reviews.text: This has everything I could need for my baby so glad I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Delos santos (iReview)

customer_reviews.title: but I like the idea of having them on hand "just in ...
customer_reviews.text: I knew when I purchased this there were likely items I would never use, but I like the idea of having them on hand "just in case". I was rather disappointed at how flimsy the "case" is, and it only comfortably holds about a third of the items. The bulkier items do not fit well at all. The Velcro is minimal and will likely not hold for very long. I think I was expecting a more durable fold out case with more durable buttons or something but I now know that is not what this is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: lots of useful items, two kits in one, very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: better used for older infant/toddler/children
customer_reviews.text: my son is now 3months old and i have yet to use the majority of these items (no need) and the items i did need to use didn't do the job as efficiently as other alike products i had: *dont like the grips on the tweezers, they make it harder to hold *both comb's brushes are spaced too far apart to comb newborns fine hairs *filing down my newborns nails didn't work as his nails are too flimsy *suction bulb's nose is too thick for newborn nose/ears
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great. Received it on time and in great condition. Absolutely happy.
customer_reviews.author: Avril S

product_meta.title: Safety 1st Stock Up for Baby Kit, Full Circle
product_meta.description:
NOTE: This is an assorted product; color and print advertised are subjected to vary.
Whether at home or on the go, the Safety 1st Stock Up for Baby Health and Grooming Kit gives Mom and Dad all the essentials they need in two convenient places. The kits includes a comprehensive assortment of baby care essentials for both a well-stocked nursery and diaper bag. The main organizer case hangs conveniently where you need it. It's great in to keep available in the nursery, but also easily rolls up for compact storage, or to take along with you for longer trips. The zippered case lets you take on-the-go items with you on everyday trips, making it easy to find these smaller essentials when you need them without having to search through every corner of the bag. It also helps keep the comb and other items clean and free from those cracker crumbs that seem to make their way into every parent's life during this stage.
feature_bullets: Large hanging case for nursery and smaller case for diaper bag
